schools.name: State Univ Of NY Hlth Sci Ctr, brooklyn Coll Of Med

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Wolfson is terrific. Smart, empathetic and a great diagnostician. A gem!
He has the perfect mix of knowledge and bedside manner that fills me with confidence he will be able to take care of me no matter what.
Wonderful doctor.  Kind, compassionate, knowledgeable.      I’ve been a patient for over 30 years.  Would highly recommend.

My husband and I have been going to Dr Wolfson for 28 years.  Dr Wolfson is a great listener and really cares about helping his patients.  He never makes me feel like he's rushing to see the next patient. His diagnoses and treatments have been spot on.
Dr. Wolfson is a dedicated veteran within the medical world. His professional attitude exudes confidence creating an instant bond of trust. He is one of the absolute best doctors I’ve had in my life.
I have been a patient of Dr. Wolfson’s for over 24 years. He is very thorough, always takes my concerns seriously and never rushes through our appointments.
Have been seeing Dr. Wolfson for many years and find he is attentive, amicable and an experienced physician.  He truly cares about his patients.
He is wonderful.  Caring and thoughtful and takes great care of his patients. I recommend him highly.

reviewDetails.comment: I've been going to Dr. Wein for over 10 years. He's a great listener, he takes time to explain issues & concerns and is an all-around great doctor. Highly recommend.
I have been to Dr Wein for years and he has always been great.  He asks very pertinent questions and is very thorough.  I have always been satisfied with my visits to Dr Wein.
I have been going to Dr. Wein for a few years now along with other Doctor's in the group.  He is very thorough and personable.
Takes time to discuss any concerns; reviews past visits for history review
Always very professional and helpful
Very attentive and kind. Good doctor.

participatingProducts.description: Open Access Plus, OA Plus, ChoiceFund OA Plus
Open Access Plus, OA Plus, ChoiceFund OA Plus with CareLink

reviewDetails.comment:
Good doctor. 
Takes time and explains everything 
His nurses are excellent

I came in with an eye injury (thankfully, cosmetic) that resulted from a fall while running.   Very professional staff, on time, and possibly the most thorough eye examination I've ever had in this lifetime.   Dr. Husted answered all my questions and gave me as much time as I needed to feel comfortable that all was going to be okay.   I'm from New York City and  my new opthamologist is in Kingston!
He's very patient, happy to answer questions. I feel very secure, knowing he's monitoring my vision.
Thorough, professional, explains everything, uses wise judgment
It was quick and I highly recommend this Dr

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Seeger has always been very courteous, professional and understands what my needs are.
Very patient and soft spoken man. Very personable.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Childs does a great job with our baby! He is extremely knowledgeable and easy to talk to about any issues or questions we may have.  I would highly recommend him to any family memeber or friend.
Dr. Childs is very informative and very receptive to all of our questions and concerns.

Dr. Childs is a fantastic doctor.  Our children love him and look forward to seeing him.  The office and patient rooms are a very welcoming place for small children and put them at ease.  Dr. Childs has tremendous ability to connect with kids and make them laugh.
Dr. Child’s is amazing ! Really connects with the children fast and is incredible at his job !
He’s fantastic. Super smart, proactive yet doesn’t panic, kind and empathetic. We love him.

I trust Dr. Childs 100% with the care of both of my children. He always provides a thorough examination and evaluation of any and all symptoms/concerns and has never ill advised us with his recommendations and treatment concerning our two sons. His care far surpasses any other doctor in my experience and we are extremely grateful to have him as a pediatrician.
He is amazing! Kind, sweet, knowledgeable and very caring. He is an excellent doctor

He is very knowledgeable and has very good bedside manners which is a really big thing for me and my family. He is hilarious yet professional. He makes us feel like our son is his only patient whenever we come for office visits. No nonsense. Excellent.
Dr. Child’s is an amazing doctor and I would highly recommend him.

reviewDetails.comment: very professional
she is very nice and doesn't push treatments on people - she listens to you and doesn't waste your time!
Dr. Panghaal was very thorough, took the time to listen, and explained her diagnosis well.
Always professional.  Dr. Panghaal and her staff are great. Office runs efficiently which is a very good thing.
She is very thorough in her examinations and explained to me clearly her diagnosis and future care.
Took her time. Very professional. And explained everything in great detail
Very sweet, very thorough, nice demeanor with the patients,
she is professional , accurate and friendly ,

reviewDetails.comment: Caring, knowledgeable, and always takes as much time as you need to answer any questions.
Dr. Blash is very friendly and easy to talk to. I like that she listened to my questions gave me good advice to achieve my health goals.

Dr. Blash was very down to earth and spoke to you with respect and and listened with such understanding.  She would share her own personal experiences with you so that you felt comfortable opening up about your own situations.  She would listen to your concerns and go through each one tell you what to do and what not to do.  At the same time if you had a concern that was not valid she would let you know so in such a professional yet friendly way.  I loved my experience with Dr. Blash and I am so happy that she is now my PCP
She was very thorough. Took her time asked questions and la good listener.Personally followed up with me after visit related to bloodwork

reviewDetails.comment: Good personality, knowledgeable and spends more time with patients than most doctors.

Dr. Lieb is very kind and compassionate always a good start.  Also, he is very thorough and takes the time to review my history and spends a good deal of time on each visit discussing current symptoms.  He is very thoughtful and has provided outstanding care.  I am very happy with his services.
Dr. Lieb is an excellent cardiologist.
Dr Lieb is very professional, listens to the patient, and extremely dedicated.
Dr Lieb is excellent and spends time understanding his patient.
Listened to issue, gave a thorough exam and pleasant to talk with.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr Cohen was attentive and his office is well run. I was seen on time and felt in good hands. Highly recommended!
Dr Cohen is first of all a medical Dr and his patients  benefit from his expertise in ophthalmology.
Very knowledgeable, pleasant, and caring doctor!

terrible doctor with zero manners for someone who was just getting their eyes checked. also he put in my chart something that did not even pertain to me nor that he discussed with me. seemed like this care practice lacks the care part.

I have problem eyes, and though I no longer live in Westchester (I divide my time between the city and upstate NY, I always return to Dr. Cohen for a yearly check on my vision. Years ago I went through many ophthalmologists because none seemed to be able to solve my problem, not even a Park Avenue opthalmologist. Dr. Cohen will be doing my cataract surgery. He is wonderful. Very thorough and careful, but also he has a great sense of humor. I recommend him enthusiastically!
been seeing him for about 15 years hes good doctor
I have been a patient for about 12 years now having an annual eye exam to assess any diabetic damage to my eyes. He is always courteous and professional
I never feel rushed with Dr Cohen. He answers questions readily and examines thoroughly.
